[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Channel: execution_wait_phase_rx] [Response ordering] Does the unbounded channel guarantee FIFO ordering of ExecutionResponse messages, or could reordering cause BufferManager to process responses out of sequence? (High)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Async: Cancellation safety] If the PipelinePhase task is cancelled while process() is awaiting the future, can this leave partial execution state in the executor causing state divergence? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Async: Tokio runtime] Can ExecutionWaitPhase's process() method block the tokio runtime thread pool, preventing other critical consensus tasks from making progress? (High)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Async: Future wake] If the execution future's waker is never called (buggy future), will process() detect this deadlock or hang forever? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Error: ExecutorError::BlockNotFound] When process() returns BlockNotFound error, can this be exploited to skip block execution by a Byzantine validator who provides futures that intentionally fail with this error? (High)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Error: ExecutorError::EmptyBlocks] If ExecutionSchedulePhase creates ExecutionWaitRequest with empty block list, does the error returned by process() get properly handled or cause consensus to stall? (High)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Error: ExecutorError::BadNumTxnsToCommit] If execution returns BadNumTxnsToCommit, does this cause permanent divergence between validators or can they recover? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Error: ExecutorError::CouldNotGetData] If process() returns CouldNotGetData timeout error, does the block get re-executed or is it permanently dropped, causing liveness issues? (High)
